## Evaluation

You will receive a Qualtrics survey for post-bootcamp evaluation.
Please fill it out.

## Payments Processing 

Once you fill out the evaluation, it will trigger the finance team regarding the payment. 

If you run into any issues regarding payment, please contact Lisa Stieler <lstieler@ics.uci.edu> and CC Mine Dogucu <mdogucu@uci.edu>

## Next-Year

Please share the [program website](https://www.stat.uci.edu/bayes-bats/) with your colleagues and help us recruit if you can.

Please keep in touch on Slack. We would love to hear your experiences of teaching/using Bayesian methods.
